# Ready, Set, Go! (software)

| latest preview version =
| latest preview date =
| operating system = Microsoft Windows

| genre = desktop publishing
| license = commercial
| website =
}}
Ready, Set, Go! (also styled ReadySetGo and ReadySetGo!) is a software package for desktop publishing. Originally developed for Apple Computer's Macintosh by Manhattan Graphics, it became one of the earliest desktop-publishing packages available for that platform. It was often compared with QuarkXPress and Aldus PageMaker in comparative magazine reviews.
It was later acquired by Diwan and is still available today for the Microsoft Windows platform.
See also
* Adobe InDesign
* Adobe PageMaker
* QuarkXPress
